meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan Cole Russ Williams Pidge Meade Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7378.

td.p: Susan Cole, a legislative librarian from Bowie, Maryland
Russ Williams, a retired Army officer from Alexandria, Virginia
Pidge Meade, a technical writer and actress from Pacifica, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,001)

tr.td: WINNER, WINNER
CHICKEN DINNER
TRAVELING THROUGH TIME
MONEY SLANG
IN CONCLUSION
@_FloridaMan
(Alex: And finally, actual news stories found by the [*] Twitter account.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In the 2000s he won Best Acting Oscars for "Mystic River" & "Milk"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In the 2000s he won Best Acting Oscars for "Mystic River" & "Milk"

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Pidge
Russ
Susan
HORRIBLE HISTORY
LANGUAGE LAB
LITERARY LONDON
COMING SUBTRACTIONS
(Alex: Each response is two movie titles.)
NEWS TERMINOLOGY
FROM DAWN TIL DUSK
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that will come between "dawn" and "dusk" in the dictionary.)

Russ
Susan
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Pidge] She wrote down Texas, that\'s the Lone Star State, so it\'s not a grouping.)
...
(Alex: [To Susan] The seven stars of the Big Dipper and the North Star...)
RussWhat is The Big Dipper?
$4,001
PidgeWhat is Texas?
$2,300
SusanWhat is California
$2,000
Alaska')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The first line of its state song, "Eight stars of gold on a field of blue", refers to the star group on its flag')

tr.td: STATE SONGS
The first line of its state song, "Eight stars of gold on a field of blue", refers to the star group on its flag
Pidge
Russ
Susan
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $20,600
Pidge
Russ
Susan

17 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W

18 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
